fields.title: Regression in create-ticket-on-push
fields.body: There seems to be a regression in the ability to create a proposal ticket from pushing a single commit.

comment.text:
This is actually caused by client-side user error with an unhelpful message generated by the server.

Revise the server's generated error message to describe the situation and suggest possible solutions.

There is another related bug here.  The repository default integration branch setting is ignored when determining the merge base of a new proposal ticket.  This scenario currently defaults to HEAD which may not match the default integration branch.
